properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 6 at 3:44PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
Narrow, northwest-southeast oriented bands of snow will occur
through midnight tonight across Fremont County. These snow bands
will be very localized in nature. It appears that the most
snowfall from these snow bands will be concentrated along highway
26 from Shoshoni, east to the Natrona County line, along Gas
Hills Road/Highway 136 east of Riverton, and along Highway 135
between Riverton and Sand Draw. These areas could see one to
three inches of snow accumulate over a relatively short period of
time. Less snowfall will likely fall in most other areas.

Travelers should anticpate rapidly fluctuating visibility along
with changing road conditions where highways become rapidly slick
and snow covered. Much of this snowfall will likely diminish by
midnight.
